::DarkMouse::

She looked at the medical drone and twitched her tail.  She got up 
and stood at the side of the bed.  She walked back and forth holding 
onto the side of the bed.  she got to thinking about her hand and 
wondered if it was a fluke or if it was something that would happen 
every time.  She looked around and saw Quickstrike jsut outside her 
door. (If that is correct, I thought the post said he was waiting 
outside Dm's room for BA)

She looked at the medical drone.  She looked and saw a sharp blade on 
the drone. She picked it up and looked at it.  She put the blade to 
her hand and closed her eyes.  She pulled the blade and sliced her 
hand open.  She winced and opened her eyes.  she looked at teh cut 
and watched the glowing fluid leak out slowly.  Then the cut started 
to heal.  In a few moments, it was perfectly healed as if she had not 
cut herself.  She smile and looked at her hand.  She knew that all 
she had to do was wait.  Once she was fully healed, she would be a 
great warrior, she thought.  She wondered why this was happeneing to 
her though.  Why not a braver bot? Why her?  She lifted herself back 
up on the bed and sat there pondering her new situation.
